body_html:
@ewilderj I've saw this behavior but I've not annotated the tickets.
Also in theory general Keras API could not be modified troughs direct PR against tf.keras right?
So I suppose that it is at high risk to become a chicken or eggs problem especially for FR where newcomers start to be exposed to tf.keras directly instead of coming from a Keras experience and I supposed this hypothesis it is not so much remote with the landing of TF 2.0 right?.
